PackageOracle.name: DA_SALES_OUTLET
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SALES_OUTLET
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.15.281316000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,total_floor_space_meas IN NUMBER
,sel_floor_space_meas IN NUMBER
,ship_loc_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,total_floor_space_meas IN NUMBER
,sel_floor_space_meas IN NUMBER
,ship_loc_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,sales_outlet_location_id IN NUMBER
,total_floor_space_meas IN NUMBER
,sel_floor_space_meas IN NUMBER
,ship_loc_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,sales_outlet_location_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_sales_outlet;

body.name: DA_SALES_OUTLET
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SALES_OUTLET
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.15.292865000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,total_floor_space_meas IN NUMBER
,sel_floor_space_meas IN NUMBER
,ship_loc_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_sales_outlet.add(fx), parms=' || total_floor_space_meas || '|' || sel_floor_space_meas || '|' || ship_loc_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_sales_outlet a
(
a.sales_outlet_location_id
,a.total_floor_space_meas
,a.sel_floor_space_meas
,a.ship_loc_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_sales_outlet_location_id.NEXTVAL
,add.total_floor_space_meas
,add.sel_floor_space_meas
,add.ship_loc_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.sales_outlet_location_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_sales_outlet.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,total_floor_space_meas IN NUMBER
,sel_floor_space_meas IN NUMBER
,ship_loc_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_sales_outlet.add, parms=' || total_floor_space_meas || '|' || sel_floor_space_meas || '|' || ship_loc_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_sales_outlet a
(
a.sales_outlet_location_id
,a.total_floor_space_meas
,a.sel_floor_space_meas
,a.ship_loc_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_sales_outlet_location_id.NEXTVAL
,add.total_floor_space_meas
,add.sel_floor_space_meas
,add.ship_loc_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_sales_outlet.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,sales_outlet_location_id IN NUMBER
,total_floor_space_meas IN NUMBER
,sel_floor_space_meas IN NUMBER
,ship_loc_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_sales_outlet.add, parms=' || sales_outlet_location_id || '|' || total_floor_space_meas || '|' || sel_floor_space_meas || '|' || ship_loc_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_sales_outlet a
(
a.sales_outlet_location_id
,a.total_floor_space_meas
,a.sel_floor_space_meas
,a.ship_loc_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.sales_outlet_location_id
,add.total_floor_space_meas
,add.sel_floor_space_meas
,add.ship_loc_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_sales_outlet.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,sales_outlet_location_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_sales_outlet.del, parms=' || sales_outlet_location_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_sales_outlet a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.sales_outlet_location_id = del.sales_outlet_location_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_sales_outlet.del');

END del;

END da_sales_outlet;
